TopicTitle: P3D SpacePort - a space sim for Prepar3D platform

Articles.Content:
Hi everyone,

I've been following these guys for a while now - they finally have a free demo for the Prepar3D flight simulator. Looks nice, I'm gonna download and try it out in the next few days. Looks like it's quite capable, although only one launcher for now (SLS)...  Here is their web site and a YT Channel.

Couple of screenshots from their P3D forum post:

Neat! If I’m not mistaken older versions of X-Plane had an Apollo lander module simulator where you could land on the moon. I also think it had a space shuttle simulator where you had to dock and pilot the shuttle down. Neat to see this happening with actual launch systems instead of stuff already in space.
